mods.abstract: RAN AWAY, ON THE EVENING OF THE 19th inst., the negro girl VICTORINE, aged about 19 years, about 4 feet 8 inches in height. For her arrest I will pay a liberal reward. G.M. LOENING, 311 Magazine street. Ja21 3t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866
